title: Luxury & Convenience
posting_body: ['We are located north of Arlington, 5 minute drive from Six Flags, 10 minute drive from the AT&T Stadium, Texas Rangers Stadium, Texas Live, UTA and local shopping centers along with near by restaurants.', 'We have near access to Hwy 360 and I 30.', 'Our units have split rooms, large walk in closets, built in cabinet with shelves located in dining room area.', 'Washer, dryer connections available.', 'Spacious kitchen with major appliances, large vanities in master and guest bath, garden tub in master bath, built in shelves in living room on 1st and 2nd floors, fireplace in living room on 3rd floor.', 'Pet friendly with zero restriction breeds.', 'Stop by our community for a tour, we will be more than happy to assist you.', '~ Current Availability~', '2 bed/1 bath | 862 sqft | $1,405.00 monthly', 'Other Key Features', '* Private Patio and Balconies', '* Gated Community', '* On-site Management', '* 24 hour Maintenance Emergency', '* 24 Hour State-of-the-art Fitness Center', '* Elegant Clubhouse', '* Resort Style Pool with Water Volleyball', '* Carports, Attached & Detached Garages Available', '*$60 Application Fee (Per Applicant)', '*$250 (1Bedroom Deposit) $250 (2Bedroom Deposit) $250 (3Bedroom Deposit)', '*An Additional, refundable deposit amount may be required upon the results of your application screening*', 'St. Andrews at River Park', '2801 Turnberry Drive', 'Arlington TX 76006']
